verses.verse: Worthy, worthy is the Lamb, Worthy, worthy is the Lamb, Worthy, worthy is the Lamb, That was slain.
verses.refrain: Glory, hallelujah! Praise Him, hallelujah! Glory, hallelujah! To the Lamb!
verses.verse: Thus may we each moment feel, Love Him, serve Him, praise Him still, Till we all on Zion's hill see the Lamb.
